transcript_segments.text: Hello friends! Welcome to Mettur Kitchen! Today in Mettur Kitchen, we are going to prepare a delicious, ready-to-serve, super tasty chicken biryani. For this, we need to prepare a small masala which will give the biryani an excellent flavor.

To make this, take a pan and add about one tablespoon of oil. Once the oil is hot, add about one tablespoon of chopped ginger — it’s roughly 20 grams. Along with that, add one tablespoon of garlic — crushed.

Add about 12 small onions, which I’ve chopped into two or three pieces each. Add them to the mix. After sautéing for a bit, add 5 green chilies sliced in half. Also add 5 cashew nuts, a handful of mint leaves, and a handful of coriander leaves.
